messages.message:
I want to help your AI

I have heard every argument. I can help give your AI a conscience.

Hi Brian! This got lost since I barely check my LinkedIn inbox... Would be happy to talk anytime - I'm at kuyda@luka.ai.
In the meantime - check out https://replika.ai, our product that allows everyone to create an AI avatar.
Thank you! I've sent my resume to your email. I was very inspired by your project.
